title: Should Bert & Romeo Get This Life-Changing Surgery?!
description:
Would you have your legs broken to be taller? What if they were already broken? Romeo actually did some research on the surgery that makes you taller and thought
about it, while Lil Duval bought an interesting take in on it. Would you do it if your legs were already broken?
